channel.title: France on AC's Blog (formerly known as Choicy White Boy)
channel.description: Recent content in France on AC's Blog (formerly known as Choicy White Boy)

item.title: A Weekend in Paris
item.author: choicywhiteboy@accapehart.com (AC Capehart)
item.description: We took the Eurostar from London to Paris on Thursday, and returned today (Sunday). I took Thursday off, and then worked from “Home” on Friday. We have about a 15 (adult) minute walk from the flat to the Brighton train station. From there, it’s a little under an hour to London, St. Pancras. From there, a little under three hours to Paris Gare de Nord. From there, 15 min on the Paris Metro and 5 minutes to the flat.
